1956

14

Luck.

interesting.

Thanking

u

u

anticipation, dam,

yours gratifully 
S. 6. Luk.

224 N. Wayne St

Angola, and.

Nov. 26, 1911. 
My dear Mr. Shams,

Thank you very 
much for your letter of the 
20th inst. After reading your 
kind advice, d am falling 
much better.

The Revolution in 
bhina has dis organized the 
Postal Service, 200 am told. 
The other Chinese student here 
is in the same plight as
raw: 1956 14 Luck. interesting. Thanking u u anticipation, dam, yours gratifully S. 6. Luk. 224 N. Wayne St Angola, and. Nov. 26, 1911. My dear Mr. Shams, Thank you very much for your letter of the 20th inst. After reading your kind advice, d am falling much better. The Revolution in bhina has dis organized the Postal Service, 200 am told. The other Chinese student here is in the same plight as

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter thanking Stearns for his advice. Luk states that the Revolution in China has disorganized the postal service.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
